title: Cell Room
short_details: It is an old phone-selling platform where a seller can publish his phone's advertisement, sell his cellphone and get payments.

see_more.details: It is an old phone resale platform where a seller can publish his phone's advertisement, sell his cell phone, and get payments. A private router was added here where only the admin could see all users, and all buyer lists. For login, added a react login form with Regex and a strong password.

title: ACC Helper
short_details: Here an accountant provide some services and users can give review on it. Admin panel and buyer list are also added in the private route.

see_more.details: It is a professional account-related service provider site where an accountant can provide his services as he wishes. A buyer or user can see details after clicking a view details button. A user can give a review after his selected service with a review form. A login and signup page has been added. Admin panel and buyer list are also added in the private route.

title: EDUMA
short_details: It is an education platform which provide some attractive courses for beginner Learners.

see_more.details: This is a teaching service providing site where I have shown courses like UX/UI Design, Illustrator, Photo Editing, Video Editing, etc. Here is a course list. If anyone clicks on a course name he will see the course details. I also added a sign-up and log-in page with a form and also added the Google and GitHub log-in systems. If anyone wants to get a premium course, he will have to pass a private path which will enable after submitting or log-in the form.
